channel.title: Docent's 464 Fix-Up [ Latest Update: FULLY WORKING GLOBAL SPAWNS! ]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/5mfm1g.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Hello there! This project (which I've been working on for quite a while now) is based STRICTLY off of the 464 Revision.[/b]
This is NOT a remake first of all, however I will not stray from vanilla runescape meaning NO customs and NO custom features that weren't in the real RuneScape back then. Now that thats out of the way, please enjoy.[/center]
Avatar for Support:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/eqebnn.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/10qf9ds.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2n6hr48.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qlhj5f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/r03znc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2u4371e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1424uw4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/18ye4m.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2cid7i9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/35d51qd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/f3t2qx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/5lcg9z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2gt6vjp.png[/img]
LATEST UPDATE 1.1.13:
Clipped firemaking!
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zxovn7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/8wdwci.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/eb1ugj.png[/img]
Clipped! (If it wasn't clipped i'd be on the other side of the wall haha.)
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/mcrr6p.png[/img]
YAY! Correct item spawns on its correct level!
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/o52nep.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/mtxiet.png[/img]
- 464 Maps - 464 Items - 464 Anims/Gfx - 464 Gameframe - 464 Npcs - No customs
[u][b]Server Features[/b][/u]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [u][b]Prayer[/b][/u]:
- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate -Zombie
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [u][b]Agility[/b][/u]:
- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable - Force movement mask - Correct animations used - Run energy affected by weight and level
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [u][b]Firemaking[/b][/u]:
- Correct anims - Sounds - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped - Can't light fires in Bank - Can click logs on the ground and light them
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [u][b]Woodcutting[/b][/u]:
- Stumps and regrowing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fell chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Spirit Tree - Canoes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b][u]Mining[/u][/b]:
- Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animations - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems - Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms - Mining gems at shilo village - Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg) - Rock Golem
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b][u]Fletching[/u][/b]:
- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b][u]Crafting[/u][/b]:
- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewelry Molding
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b][u]Thieving[/u][/b]:
- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Times
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [u][b]Fishing[/b][/u]:
- All fishing spots - All fishes fishable - Correct equipment - Correct animations - Moving locations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [u][b]Cooking[/b][/u]:
- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [u][b]Runecrafting[/b][/u]:
- Altar Enterting - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [u][b]Herblore[/b][/u]:
- All potions makeable - Itentifying herbs - Weapon poisioning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [u][b]Smithing[/b][/u]:
- All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct anims, working interfaces & objects
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img] [b][u]Slayer[/u][/b]:
- All Slayer Masters - All Slayer Monsters - Basic Slayer Gem - Slayer Points - Slayer Shop
[u][b]Farming[/b][/u]:
-Nothing (haha)
[u][b]Hunter[/b][/u]:
-Nothing
[u][b]Construction[/b][/u]:
-Nothing
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [u][b]Combat[/b][/u]:
-Slightly buggy combat, clipping issues with range and what not. -Solid Range Formula -Correct Melee Max hit Formula
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [u][b]Minigames[/b][/u]:
-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows -Fight Pits -Pest Control -Fishing Trawler -Gnome Ball -Bar crawl -Blast Furnace -Champion's Challenge -Chompy hunting -Games room -Jungle Clean Up -Pet Care (You get a pet, feed it, take care of it until it grows, and sell it for rewards at ardougne) -Rogue Trader -Rogue's Den -Splitbark Armour -Temple Trekking -Magic Training Arena
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [u][b]Random Events[/b][/u]:
-Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Sand which Lady -Genie -Rock Golem) -Spirit Tree -Zombie -Evil Chicken
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [u][b]Quests[/b][/u]:
-Cook's Assistant -Romeo and Juliet -Witches Potion -Imp Catcher -Dorics Quest -Vampyre Slayer -Restless Ghost -Gertrude's Cat -Sheep Shearer -Rune Mysteries
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [u][b]Miscellaneous[/b][/u]:
-99 % of runescape spawns -25.2 % of runescape shops (28 shops loaded)
Unknown if there are dupes
-99 % of runescape foods added -90 % of all doors around the world (Very buggy, I added a door system but closing doors doesn't work and when closing already open ones the doors gets messed up, but technically they work.) -90 % potions (A few might be missing) -Working NPC Drops -All guilds openable with requirements -Wilderness warning sign -Normal and Ancient Magics -Lunar Magics -Exact Runescape Teleports (Gives exp, requires runes, requires levels, misc teleport, requires member for ancients and some moderns, and more...) -Actual RuneScape Starter -Actual RuneScape Prices -Adding Quests Exactly like Runescape -Report Abuse -Runescape like Sailing with all locations -Full Gnome Glider Transportation -Bank Pins -Christmas Crackers -Fully Functional Teletabs -Full Pickables (Cabbage, Flax, Wheat, Onions, Potato, Etc...) -Full Weapon Poisioning -Add or Drop Item Function (If you don't have enough room it goes on the ground) -Chat Filtering System -Fully Functional 99 % Skill Guides -Al Kharid Gates and Shantay Pass -Running with Energy -Weight -Runescape Combat Exp Rates -Magic Carpet -Ladder System -Rings that will be ingame (Dueling, Wealth, Recoil) (Life) -Amulets that will be ingame (Glory, Games Necklace, Ghostspeak Amulet) -Clue scrolls (Tons of scrolls loaded) -Hide Tanning -Canoes -Music Player -Looping animations added (Don't stop half way through) -Random Events -Crystal Chest -Flax Stringing -Aubury -Clipped Npcs (Walking, Following) (Attacking) -Clipped Following -Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc) - Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc) - Perfect Magic Enchanting added - Al Kharid Desert Added - Great Membership system Countdown/Members/Non members Items - Teleporting to Zanaris with Dramen staff in Inventory or equipped - Pets System Added - Global Drops

item.title: Docent's 464 Fix-Up [ Latest Update: FULLY WORKING GLOBAL SPAWNS! ]
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

buzenr:

Are you using a Mac to develop this? If so, I will definitely download once you’re finished since I know I’ll be able to run it with no problem!

Java works on every machine that has Java installed. If you’re referring to batch and shell files, just use an IDE to remove the need for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Docent's 464 Fix-Up [ Latest Update: FULLY WORKING GLOBAL SPAWNS! ]
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:11, topic:537942”][quote author=Scully link=topic=656765.msg4394410#msg4394410 date=1388682700]

So does this 464 cache have the maps packed into it, or are you loading XTEA keys?

I believe that it loads XTEA keys.

Would you care to do a check on that for me? I’ve been looking for a 464 cache without maps packed into it for a ridiculously long amount of time…
[/quote]

Uhh… How would I check? I only said that it does because theres two folders in the servers data folder called “map data” and “maps”[/quote]

Find in the server where it does the loading of those files. Comment out the line that loads it, and then run the server and log in.

If the maps don’t load objects then you’re loading XTEA keys. If they do, then you’ve got them packed into the cache.

Read full topic
